name: Scan your books with Android barcodes and save them in a Google Sheet spreadsheet
description: Every time a book's barcode is scanned via the Make Android app, Make will automatically search for the book's metadata and save it to the Google Sheets spreadsheet of your choice. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1UoE4k1jJpqRFNjUVMbwkJBUpsoUkzaaQ4RNMKlOsoac/edit?usp=sharing).
